meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a block.
meanings.sent1: The toy robot had a blocky head.
meanings.sent2: The building had a blocky design with sharp edges.
meanings.sent3: The blocky puzzle piece didn't fit in the round hole.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so blocky, it looked like printed text.
meanings.sent5: The blocky clouds in the sky resembled giant building blocks.

meanings.definition: Having a square or rectangular shape.
meanings.sent1: The blocky table fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The computer screen displayed blocky images.
meanings.sent3: The blocky cake was easy to cut into equal pieces.
meanings.sent4: The blocky shadows on the wall looked like pixel art.
meanings.sent5: The blocky bookshelf held all her favorite books neatly.

meanings.sent1: The blocky furniture in the room was heavy and durable.
meanings.sent2: The old castle had blocky walls made of stone.
meanings.sent3: The blocky tree stump served as a makeshift seat.
meanings.sent4: His blocky shoes protected his feet during the hike.
meanings.sent5: The blocky armor made the knight look invincible.
